title: lvl 6 mastery

embed.description: Every game is a story; visit the new League of Legends match history to check out how this one ends and share your own!

body:
I'm not sure if this is a glitch or not, but i didnt get my 2nd lvl 6 mastery shard for Braum

i can not get them in URF?

replies.body:
AS DTN has mentioned, you are **unable** to earn Champion Mastery tokens in URF mode. Even if a rotating game mode is hosted on the Summoner Rift map, you can only earn tokens in regular or Ranked summoner's rift matches.

If you have any other questions, don't hesitate to ask. ^.^

> i can not get them in URF?

Nope, sorry. You can only earn Mastery tokens in Normal or Ranked SR.

http://boards.eune.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/champions-gameplay-en/KZnWzcGK-hextech-crafting-and-mastery-frequently-asked-questions
